; 1235902660 特朗普延迟禁令执法后，蒂克托克返回苹果和Google App商店https://www.billboard.com/pro/tiktok-returns-papple-google-app-stores/Marc Schneider Fri, 14 Feb 2025 16:04:54 +0000 BusinessTechapp storespoliticsTikTok https://www.billboard.com/?post_type = billboard_pro_post&p=1235902721 The CEO of TikTok was among the attendees at Trump's inauguration ceremony.

唐纳德·特朗普总统推迟执行蒂克托克禁令后，蒂克托克已返回美国苹果和谷歌的应用商店。

由中国技术公司经营的Tiktok于1月18日从Apple和Google的App Stores中删除，以遵守一项法律，该法律要求派遣该应用程序剥离该应用程序或在美国被禁止

该流行的社交媒体应用程序拥有超过1.7亿美国用户，此前曾在美国保证他将推迟禁止该应用程序的情况下在美国暂停其服务一天。 Tiktok服务短暂暂停，促使成千上万的用户迁移到中国社交媒体应用程序Rednote，同时称自己为“ Tiktok难民”。

Tiktok应用程序可在美国Apple App Store和Google Play商店再次下载。在特朗普任职的第一天，他签署了一项行政命令，将对Tiktok的禁令执行到4月5日。

长期以来，蒂克托克（Tiktok）在美国遇到了麻烦，美国政府声称其中国的所有权并获得了数百万美国人的数据，使其成为国家安全风险。

蒂克托克（Tiktok）否认指控它已按照中国政府的要求共享了我们的用户数据，并认为要求将其剥离或禁止的法律侵犯了美国用户的第一修正案权利。

在特朗普任期任期期间，他支持班蒂克托克（Tiktok），但后来改变了主意，声称他对该应用程序有一个“温暖的地方”。 Tiktok首席执行官Shou Chew是特朗普就职典礼的与会者之一。

特朗普建议Tiktok可以共同拥有，其中一半的所有权是美国人。潜在的买家包括房地产大亨Frank McCourt，鲨鱼坦克投资者Kevin O'Leary和受欢迎的Youtuber Jimmy Donaldson，也称为Mrbeast。

; 1235900017 Friday Music Guide: New Music From Drake & PARTYNEXTDOOR, Sabrina Carpenter, JISOO & More https://www.billboard.com/music/pop/friday-music-guide-drake-partynextdoor-sabrina-carpenter-jisoo-1235902612/Jason Lipshutz Fri, 14 Feb 2025 14:29:20 +0000 MusicPopfirst streamfriday music guideMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235902612 Check out the must-hear releases of the week.

Billboard's Friday Music Guide serves as a handy guide to this Friday's most essential releases — the key music that everyone will be talking about today, and that will be dominating playlists this weekend and beyond.

This week, Drake and PND flip the script, Sabrina Carpenter makes Short a little longer, and JISOO arrives as a solo star. Check out all of this week's picks below:

Drake & PARTYNEXTDOOR, $ome $exy $ongs 4 U

Drake wants you to forget about the Kendrick Lamar chatter, and remember that it's Valentine's Day. With $ome $exy $ongs 4 U, a new project with his pal PARTYNEXTDOOR that functions like the R&B version of Her Loss as a full-length collaboration, Drizzy focuses on personal opulence and romantic entanglements while occasionally nodding toward current events: “F–ka rap beef, I'm tryna get the party lit,” he sneers on “Gimme a Hug.”

Sabrina Carpenter, Short n' Sweet (Deluxe)

Although Sabrina Carpenter's commercial breakthrough Short n' Sweet was released less than six months ago, the pop star has been on such a hot streak that she added five new tracks to the short, sweet full-length: this deluxe edition not only boasts a Dolly Parton-assisted version of the No. 1 hit “Please Please Please,” but a new synth-pop confection, “Busy Woman,” that sounds like it could be Carpenter's next innuendo-heavy smash.

JISOO, Amortgage

As her BLACKPINK group mates ROSÉ, LISA and JENNIE have all made their solo bids in recent months, JISOO has dropped a head-turning project of her own: Amortgage is miles beyond her 2023 double-single ME as far as sonic identity and vocal confidence, as tracks like the kinetic single “Earthquake” and snappy dance track “Hugs & Kisses” recall delicious turn-of-the-century bubblegum, streamlined for a new generation.

Selena Gomez & Benny Blanco, “Scared of Loving You”

The newly engaged Selena Gomez and Benny Blanco have also teamed up for a collaborative album, I Said I Love You First , that arrives in March, and while “Scared of Loving You” launches that project with muted vulnerability, the track also represents the welcome return of Gomez as one of our most thoughtful pop stars, five years removed from her last solo album.

Addison Rae, “High Fashion”

Fans of Addison Rae's smoky delivery and sensual lyricism on last year's “Diet Pepsi” have received a worthy sequel with “High Fashion,” as the former social media star and rising pop siren sounds increasingly confident while delivering lines like “I don't need your drugs / I'd rather get, rather get high fashion.”

The Lumineers, Automatic

Rustic folk-rock has certainly made its way back into the mainstream thanks in part to troubadours like Noah Kahan and Hozier, although the Lumineers, who planted their flag in that area over a decade ago, aren't interested in trend-chasing on new album Automatic , which finds the veteran band tossing out racing anthems rather than getting lost in banjo side quests.

Sam Smith, “Love is a Stillness”

A press release describes Sam Smith's latest single as “a Valentine's gift to their fans,” and if you're a longtime supporter of Smith's honey-voiced piano balladry, “Love is a Stillness” harkens back to their career beginnings, swerving away from pop experimentation to remind listeners how sturdy that classic vocal power remains.

Editor's Pick: Bon Iver, “Everything is Peaceful Love”

“Everything is Peaceful Love,” the latest taste of Bon Iver's long-awaited fifth album, has softer features than classics like “Skinny Love” and even “Holocene,” but has the same sort of immediate accessibility: Justin Vernon weaves his falsetto into multi-part harmonies and vibes out to the soft-rock synthesizers, creating another blissful anthem for patio listening in the summertime.

; 1235902588 音乐业务中的制作人协议一团糟。系统必须更改（访客列） https://www.billboard.com/pro/producer-deals-music-mesic-mess-change-guest-column/Chris Eggertsen Fri, 14 Feb 2025 14:00:00 +0000 BusinessPublishingcontractsguest columnproducers https://www.billboard.com/?post_type=billboard_pro_post&p=1235902496 Producers often wait months to be properly credited and paid for their work. For their sake, the industry must find a more efficient way to do business.

看看过去一年中您最喜欢的专辑，很有可能有10至30种不同的制作人为此做出了贡献。然而，在这种“合作时代”继续产生文化定义的热门歌曲中，我们有一个问题：我们如何处理所有这些生产者合同？

In the US model, producer deals are seldom discussed until after a label signs a recording agreement with an artist.一旦达成协议，艺术家将直接与从事音乐音乐的任何制作人签约，这是艺术家与标签的交易的要求。 The artist then requests that the label pay, credit and account to the producer per the terms of their agreement.不幸的是，这个复杂的过程通常变成了断电的游戏。

有关的

制片人正在努力获得报酬 - 甚至有些与特拉维斯·斯科特（Travis Scott）合作的人

02/15/2024

Discussions on this topic can quickly lead to finger-pointing.但是，总的来说，今天生产者面临的问题不是“我们与他们”的问题。艺术家多次要求该标签与生产者没有直接的合同关系，以表彰该标签在谈判中几乎没有作用的交易条款。即使制片人协议表示将在签署后的五天内支付生产商，除非该标签同意在该时间范围内付款，否则该时间表将不会受到尊重，而生产者的唯一选择是与艺术家一起拿走。

当音量增加时，这种断开连接将变得更加问题。 I currently represent over 30 producers and, on average, my office handles 20 to 40 producer agreements a week.其中包括代表我们的制片人的审查以及为我们的艺术家客户制定协议，后者可能需要多个协议（甚至多达五，六个）才能清除一首歌。对于像我这样的精品公司来说，它使我们忙碌，如果没有以正确和及时的方式完成清理，则可能会很头疼。在某些情况下，它们可以举行发布日期，如果无法正确执行，则会导致版权侵权主张可能导致诉讼。

在为艺术家谈判唱片交易时，我确保与标签上有关他们如何向生产商支付和帐户的对话，因为预先确保对标签政策的清晰度是绝对必须的。

并非总是这样。过去，在录制项目开始之前，艺术家会将预算提案提交给涵盖给定项目中所有创建者的标签。通常，艺术家会使用标签预算的预算来聘请一位制作人，他们将负责招聘，管理和付款，以完成专辑所需的音乐家和其他创意。

但是，今天，除非您已经是行业领先的生产商，否则您将以规格进入工作室。这意味着您和其他20多名希望的制作人与艺术家一起制作了40首左右的歌曲，其中12至15首歌曲通常是专辑的最终剪辑。没有使它的歌曲被认为是免费的，基于试用的作品。如果给定制片人的一首或多首歌曲确实晋级，希望制片人的律师可以谈判良好的术语。

From Points to Publishing, Here's How — and How Much — Producers Get Paid Now

10/11/2023

不幸的是，由于间隙问题，有很多优秀的音乐没有看到一天的光芒，更不用说由于未能遵守生产者的交易而从发行后从流媒体服务中删除的音乐（或者未能执行它们完全）。但是，即使在可以解决问题的最佳情况下，大多数生产商通常都必须等待很长时间才能因为过度复杂的过程而获得一分钱。

在此过程的第一步中，该协议必须由艺术家和制片人签署，如果那个艺术家正在巡回演出，有时是一项艰巨的任务。之后，标签必须接受该协议（有时可能与最初与艺术家签署的录音交易相抵触），收到发票（有时在实际“收到”之前多次，并且与标签策略一致）和新的供应商文书工作，并等待生产商在标签的特定支付系统中注册。

“很多人都认为我们要做的就是按下按钮，而金钱已经熄灭，但是管理员在后端进行的支票和余额太多，以确保付款适当地处理，并以及时的方式处理。”一家主要唱片公司高级主管，他要求保持不愿透露姓名。当然，我们必须了解贴标签员工违背的后勤负担和实际业务现实。但是与此同时，我们必须认识到生产者的困境，尽管为标签赚钱，但仍被迫等待他们依靠的付款来养活家人。标签上的许多员工都理解这一点，并且知道系统必须改变。

Warner Records A＆R副总裁Malita Rice说：“在不错的时间内支付创意者的付款时，有一个巨大的脱节。” “我们必须牢记他们的生计，不仅从标签和艺术家的角度思考。如果您不能不付钱就可以走出杂货店，为什么如果没有创意获得报酬或等待几个月或数年的报酬，那么为什么要发行音乐？”

尽管这些系统和断开连接继续存在，但即使他们的音乐变成了病毒的Tiktok声音，“成功”的生产商仍将继续努力支付账单。

管理这些许可是对资源的负担，以至于任何渴望在音乐中做到这一点的律师都应该首先学习许可文档。 And for producers who want to put themselves in a better situation?我的朋友和同事鲍勃·塞莱斯汀（Bob Celestin ）分享了这一建议：“制片人和词曲作者获得出版款的众多障碍之一是忽视或完全拒绝，有时会记录他们共同创造的歌曲中各自的所有权利益，”他说。 “The easiest way to solve this problem is by utilizing split sheets at some point after they've jointly created a song.”

尽管如此，虽然对此进行勤奋可以帮助生产者，但它并不能解决系统本身的总体问题。

那么这里的前进道路是什么？建议已经浮出水面了多年：工会生产者。利用AI减少管理工作。制定新的“默认”生产商协议，以启动该过程。 Go the way of the UK music industry and have labels contract directly with producers.

事实是，所有这些所谓的解决方案都将有助于减轻当前问题，同时还可以创建新的问题。这与生产商与唱片公司与艺术家的关系无关，而是要解决一个在整个行业中具有负面连锁反应的问题。我们必须将每个人带到桌子上创建一个更公正的系统。
